ReportTitle.StrSql: WITH DATASOURCE AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY') as YEAR, NVL(A.USER_NAME, M.SURGEON) AS SURGEON, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '01', 1, 0)) AS JAN, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '02', 1, 0)) AS FEB, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '03', 1, 0)) AS MAR, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '04', 1, 0)) AS APR, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '05', 1, 0)) AS MAY, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '06', 1, 0)) AS JUN, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '07', 1, 0)) AS JUL, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '08', 1, 0)) AS AUG, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '09', 1, 0)) AS SEPT, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '10', 1, 0)) AS OCT, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '11', 1, 0)) AS NOV, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'MM'), '12', 1, 0)) AS DEC, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MED_OPERATION_MASTER M LEFT JOIN MED_HIS_USERS A ON M.SURGEON=A.USER_JOB_ID WHERE M.OPER_STATUS_CODE >= 35 AND TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY')=:STARTTIME AND (M.DEPT_CODE=:DEPTCODE OR :DEPTCODE IS NULL) AND (M.SURGEON=:SURGEON OR :SURGEON IS NULL) GROUP BY NVL(A.USER_NAME, M.SURGEON),TO_CHAR(M.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY') ) SELECT * FROM DATASOURCE UNION ALL SELECT '' AS YEAR, '总计' AS SURGEON, SUM(JAN), SUM(FEB), SUM(MAR), SUM(APR), SUM(MAY), SUM(JUN), SUM(JUL), SUM(AUG), SUM(SEPT), SUM(OCT), SUM(NOV), SUM(DEC), SUM(COUNT) FROM DATASOURCE

SELECT A.INP_NO, A.DEPT_NAME, A.NAME, A.OPERATION_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OPER_DATE FROM V_OPERATION_MASTER_V2 A WHERE a.oper_status_code >= 35 and to_char(a.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME, 'yyyy')= :STARTTIME AND (A.DEPT_CODE=:DEPTCODE OR :DEPTCODE IS NULL) AND (A.SURGEON=:SURGEON OR :SURGEON IS NULL) and (a.surgeon_id= :SURGEON_NAME or a.SURGEON= :SURGEON_NAME OR :SURGEON_NAME IS NULL )

select a.patient_id, a.visit_id, a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age, a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where to_char(NVL( A.IN_DATE_TIME,A.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME),'yyyymmdd') = to_char(:STARTTIME,'yyyymmdd') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and A.OPERATING_ROOM_NO = :VOPERROOMNO and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE <= 35 and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE >= 0

select a.patient_id, a.visit_id, a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age, a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where to_char(NVL( A.IN_DATE_TIME,A.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME),'yyyymmdd') = to_char(:STARTTIME,'yyyymmdd') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and A.OPERATING_ROOM_NO = :VOPERROOMNO and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE >= 55

select a.patient_id, a.visit_id, a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age, a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where to_char(NVL( A.IN_DATE_TIME,A.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME),'yyyymmdd') = to_char(:STARTTIME,'yyyymmdd') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and A.OPERATING_ROOM_NO = :VOPERROOMNO and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE < 55 and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE > 35

select a.patient_id, a.visit_id, a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age, a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where to_char(NVL( A.IN_DATE_TIME,A.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME),'yyyymmdd') = to_char(:STARTTIME,'yyyymmdd') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and A.OPERATING_ROOM_NO = :VOPERROOMNO and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE = -80
